description: Use this api to update the seller status for buyer to collect the parcel directly from your premises. Only includes collection that within in apply fee collection, and that the order has been parceled by the buyer. The shared call in logistics_get_seller_status or v2.logistics.get_package_detail_for_seller should have a v2.logistics.get_pickup_status_list to get this package_number or other details.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned once registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for api access, users to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required inputs for regular seller orders.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Authentication signature calculated using partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key. More details.

parameters.name: package_number
parameters.description: Request unique identifier for the package under an order

parameters.name: set_collection_logistics_status
parameters.description: Order logistics status, available values: ready_for_collection order_collected

parameters.name: error_image_url
parameters.description: List of image url list the error that have already provided the order at the store. Please ensure the url can be accessible. Only required if user set order_collection_failed. Maximum 1 image to upload and get the image url. All the images should be pure pixel-like elements. 1 face only.

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if fail error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if fail error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking
